text: Source: WID.world (2017). See wir2018wid.world /methodology.html for data series
On the horizontal axis, the world population is divided into
hundred groups of equal population size
ascending order from left to right, according to
cach group's income Ievel. The Top 1% group is divided into ten groups, the richest of these groups is also divided into ten groups_
and the very top group is again
divided into ten groups of equal population size. The vertica
axis shows the total income growth of an average individual in each group between 1980 and 2016.For
